name: XRInputSourceEventInit.inputSource
description: The XRInputSourceEventInit dictionary's inputSource property is used when calling the XRInputSourceEvent() constructor to specify the XRInputSource from which the newly-created event is being sent.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRInputSourceEventInit.inputSource' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
